P

placeBriefCase(int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
This method saves the integers row and col to Map.briefCaseRow and Map.briefCaseCol, respectively, and then places the briefcase in Map.position, which is denoted by the integer 8.
placeEnemy(int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
This method sets the Map.position to the enemy's value, 3.
placeItem(int, int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
This method breaks up the three items that are placed on the map into three different cases: invulnerability (5), radar (6), and ammo (7) into Map.position.
placePlayer(int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
The placePlayer method takes the player's coordinates as arguments and uses them to save it into @playerRow and Map.playerCol and sets the corresponding coordinates in the Map.position array to 4.
Player - Class in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp
 
Player() - Constructor for class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Player
 
playerAttack() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This method represents GameEngine.theSpy's attack.
playerCol - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
These fields hold the player's row and column positions.
playerMove(int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This method lets the GameEngine.theSpy move and pick up items GameEngine.theItem by passing GameEngine.checkItems(int, int).
playerRow - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
These fields hold the player's row and column positions.
playerShoot(int, int, int, int) - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This method is passed by GameEngine.playerAttack() and checks whether GameEngine.theSpy hit GameEngine.theNinja.
playerTurn() - Method in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.GameEngine
This method lets GameEngine.theSpy take multiple actions in the outer and directional game menus.
position - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Map
This field holds the different integer identifiers for all the different possible things that can be held on the map, including emptiness.
possibleCol - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.ActiveAgent
This represents the possible future colPosition of the object.
possibleColSpawn - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.PowerUp
These fields represent the possible spawning positions of the items, which are randomized in PowerUp.spawnPossibleLocation() and are used to ensure the location is empty enough to be placed.
possibleRow - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.ActiveAgent
This represents the possible future rowPosition of the object.
possibleRowSpawn - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.PowerUp
These fields represent the possible spawning positions of the items, which are randomized in PowerUp.spawnPossibleLocation() and are used to ensure the location is empty enough to be placed.
PowerUp - Class in edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp
This class is for powerup items that the player can pick up in the game.
PowerUp(int) - Constructor for class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.PowerUp
This constructor instantiates the items' fields: PowerUp.itemID, PowerUp.turnsInvincible, PowerUp.isRadar, and PowerUp.isAmmo.
previousCol - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.ActiveAgent
This represents the previous colPosition of the object.
previousRow - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.ActiveAgent
This represents the previous rowPosition of the object.
pursuitMode - Variable in class edu.cpp.cs.cs141.gp.Enemy
When the game is set to hard mode, the enemy can switch into pursuit mode, during which it will follow the player.
